column1: 1594315416251211778,1594315416251211778She might've not cared, but her Colonel sure as hell did.  He quickly stood in front of her and barked orders to those trying to get a peek to leave.  Most saw this action as him trying to protect her from creeps. They weren't wrong, but behind this kind action was jealousy. https://t.co/6tzrXZo1Vm t_end
